title: Privacy Notice - Highlight
content:
Your Privacy Rights

Introduction
Thinktiv, Inc. and its Highlight partners (collectively, “Thinktiv” or “we” or “us”) has created this Privacy Policy in order to disclose its use of consumer data collected about you in conjunction with GetHighlight.com and the Highlight services (collectively, “Highlight”). This Privacy Policy is effective as of January 15, 2021. Any questions regarding this policy should be directed by email to Thinktiv.com. You may also contact Thinktiv at 1011 San Jacinto Blvd. #202, Austin, Texas 78701. The following discloses Thinktiv’s information gathering and dissemination practices for Highlight.

Information Collected and Received
Thinktiv may collect or receive information about each person who registers with Highlight including, but not limited to, user-name, password, first and last name, email address, street address, gender, occupation, and interests. Thinktiv also collects information on the pages you access, the materials that are processed by the service, and other information you may volunteer, such as survey information. Thinktiv may also collect user location information, as further described in the “Global Positioning System” paragraph below.

Uses of Information
WE WILL NEVER SELL YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS, OR ANY OTHER PERSONAL INFORMATION, TO ANY THIRD PARTY WITHOUT YOUR PERMISSION. EVER.

Except as described in this section, we will not disclose your personal information to any third party without notifying you of our intent to share the information and giving you an opportunity to prevent your information from being shared.

We use your personal information to provide the services, which includes the storage of recordings in our service provider.
From time to time, we may partner with companies based on the interests of our users. These partner companies will never see your email address or any other information that could identify you or be used to contact you directly.

Any exceptions to this policy of sharing your name, address or email address with a partner company will be done only with your permission.

Thinktiv reserves the right to disclose information when required by law.

We occasionally use other companies to perform services necessary to our operations. In the course of providing these services, those companies may have access to your personal information. By contractual agreement, those companies must treat your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. However, we will not be liable for any damages that may result from the misuse of your personal information by these companies.

Thinktiv may use your IP address to help diagnose problems with Highlight’s server and to administer Highlight’s web site. Your IP address may also be used to help identify you and your online profile and to gather broad demographic information.

The Highlight site registration form requires users to give Thinktiv contact information (such as your name and email address) and demographic information (such as your zip code, age, or income level). Thinktiv uses your contact information from the registration form to send you information about Highlight and promotional material from some of Thinktiv’s partners. Your contact information may also be used to contact you when necessary. Thinktiv may use demographic and/or profile data to tailor the your experience on the Highlight website and/or applications, show you content that Thinktiv thinks you may be interested in, and display content according to your preferences. The demographic and profile data will be shared with third parties ONLY on an aggregate basis. Furthermore, Thinktiv shall have the right to retain records of all data pertaining to use of the website and applications including, but not limited to, usage, activity logs, and click-throughs. Thinktiv may disclose such data to third parties provided it is grouped with other Highlight users’ data and is presented in an aggregate form.

We may also disclose, on an anonymous basis, statements made by our users.

Children’s Privacy
We do not knowingly collect any information from anyone who we know to be under the age of 13. If you are under the age of 18, you should use this website only with the involvement of a parent or guardian and should not submit any personal information to us. If we discover that a person under the age of 13 has provided us with any personal information, we will use commercially reasonable efforts to delete such person's personal information from all Thinktiv systems.

Global Positioning System
Global Positioning System (GPS) tracking technology may need to be enabled in Thinktiv products and services in order to determine the location (latitude and longitude) of users of the Thinktiv products and services. This information is transmitted to Thinktiv, Thinktiv’s users, and temporarily stored by Thinktiv. Thinktiv does not provide this information to any other third party. This information is used in conjunction with Thinktiv’s applications.

Security
Thinktiv uses industry-standard technologies when transferring and receiving consumer data exchanged between Thinktiv and other companies to help ensure its security. This site has security measures in place to protect the loss, misuse and alteration of the information under Thinktiv’s control. Thinktiv’s servers are backed up regularly and protected by security systems.

Cookies
“Cookies” are small pieces of information that are stored by your browser on your computer's hard drive. The Thinktiv site uses cookies to keep track of your session, shopping cart, and advertising delivery. Thinktiv may also use cookies to deliver content specific to your interests and to save your password. Thinktiv may use an outside ad company to display ads on the Thinktiv site. These ads may also contain cookies. While Thinktiv uses cookies in other parts of its web site, cookies received with banner ads are collected by Thinktiv’s ad company and Thinktiv does not have access to this information.

We may use standard Internet technology, such as web beacons and other similar technologies, to track your use on our sites and software. We also may include web beacons in promotional e-mail messages or newsletters to determine whether messages have been opened and acted upon. The information we obtain in this manner enables us to customize the services we offer our users to deliver targeted advertisements and to measure the overall effectiveness of our online advertising, content, programming or other activities.

We may allow third parties, including our authorized service providers, advertising companies, and ad networks, to display advertisements on our site and/or software. Thinktiv and these companies may use tracking technologies, such as cookies, to collect information about users who view or interact with these advertisements and connect to the Thinktiv properties and/or software. Our properties do not provide any personal information to these third parties. This information allows Thinktiv and these companies to deliver targeted advertisements and gauge their effectiveness.

Links
Thinktiv may create links to other web sites. Thinktiv will make a reasonable effort to link only to sites that meet similar standards for maintaining each individual's right to privacy. However, many other sites that are not associated or authorized by Thinktiv may have links leading to our site. Thinktiv cannot control these links and Thinktiv is not responsible for any content appearing on these sites.

Amendments
Thinktiv may amend this policy at any time. If Thinktiv is going to use personally identifiable information collected through Highlight in a manner materially different from that stated at the time of collection, Thinktiv will notify users via email and/or by posting a notice on Highlight for thirty (30) days prior to such use. This Privacy Policy may not be otherwise amended except in a writing that specifically refers to this Privacy Policy and is physically signed by both parties.
Successors and Assigns
This Privacy Policy inures to the benefit of successors and assigns of Thinktiv.

Contacts
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, the practices of this site, or your dealings with this web site, you can contact info@thinktiv.com. Upon request, Thinktiv will provide you with access to information (e.g., name, address, phone number) that Thinktiv collects and maintains about you. This site gives you the following options for changing and modifying information previously provided: (i) email: info@thinktiv.com; or (ii) visit thinktiv.com.

Opt-Out
The Thinktiv site provides users the opportunity to opt-out of receiving communications from Thinktiv, except transactional correspondence. To opt-out of receiving our communications, you can (i) send email to info@thinktiv.com; or (ii) send postal mail to: Thinktiv, Inc., 1011 San Jacinto Blvd. #202, Austin, Texas 78701.
